'That's great, congrats to both of you!\nHere's to Yamato and Shuri!'%K%P
We'd met up with Kagura and told her that\nShuri and I had started going out.%K%P
At first she'd been shocked, but then\nshe smiled and wished us well.%K%P
'I'm really sorry. I made you worry about me so much,\nand now...'%K%P
'It's not something you need to apologize for, Shuri.\nIf anyone should apologize, it's YOU, Yamato.'%K%P
'Taking advantage of a girl in her hour of need!'%K%P
'Ow ow ow! That hurts, Kagura!'%K%P
Kagura suddenly gave me a noogie.%K%P
'Okay, fine. Just letting off some steam.'%K%P
'If you two are together now, you can go ahead and\ntake me on with everything you've got!'%K%P
'Even if it's two on one, I won't lose!'%K%P
'Kagura's amazing...'%K%P
'She puts me to shame.\nI could never be as cool as that.'%K%P
'Then we'll leave coolness to Kagura.\nAnd I'll work the cute angle.'%K%P
Sure enough, the way Shuri looked when she said that\nwas the epitome of cuteness.%K%P
She was already cute when she tried to act aloof,\nbut now that she'd started to open up around me\nthings were on a whole new level.%K%P
'...I almost feel bad that other people\nget to watch you.'%K%P
'Oh, you want to keep me all to yourself?'%K%P
'Well, I am your boyfriend, after all.'%K%P
'Sounds like somebody's getting jealous.\nYou're so cute, Yamato.'%K%P
'C'mon, don't tease me.'%K%P
Having reported to Kagura, we headed to\nShuri's usual spot for practice.%K%P
Yesterday we'd been too distracted by our new\nrelationship, but the final round of auditions\nwere drawing closer and we needed a definite plan.%K%P
'I guess I'll start with a quick run through.'%K%P
I decided to check out what\nkind of form Shuri was in.%K%P
Even without Kagura, she'd polished her part and made\nthe routine her own.%K%P
Her singing was just as great as ever,\nand her dance moves weren't bad either.%K%P
Perhaps it was just comparing herself to Kagura\nthat had made her insecure before.%K%P
'How was it?'%K%P
'Good.\nGoing solo hasn't harmed your performance one bit.'%K%P
'But there's something missing.\nI feel like we need something extra to get\nthrough this round.'%K%P
There was only so far we could get by raising the\nstandard of Shuri's basic skills.%K%P
If we were really going to blow the judges away,\nwe'd need a new angle.%K%P
'Something extra... Like this, maybe?'%K%P
Shuri raised a finger and made flower petals appear.%K%P
'Yeah! The kind of thing only a Divine Idol can do!'%K%P
'We all have our individual powers. I suppose they\ncould be used to enhance the performance.'%K%P
'But it's only superficial.\nIt could be flashy, but that's all it is.'%K%P
'You're not giving yourself enough credit.\nThink of L☆SEVEN, they pull of some pretty awesome\neffects in their shows, right?'%K%P
'It's not fair to compare me to them.\nThey're at the top of the industry.%K%P
The quality and amount of the Sakimitama\nthey've collected is worlds apart from mine.'%K%P
L☆SEVEN's explosive popularity meant they could\ngather more power from their Sakimitama.%K%P
The more divine power they had, the more flashy they\ncould make their shows. If Shuri could stand out from\nthe crowd, that would give her the edge she needed.%K%P
'I think I can imagine what you're thinking,\nbut it probably won't work.%K%P
'How can you be so sure?'%K%P
'Because that's exactly why I didn't\nfinish first in the preliminaries.%K%P
We only formed Love☆Kami on the spur of the moment,\nso even if we won new followers, there was no time\nfor their affection for us to take root.'%K%P
'The goddess who placed first has been active\naround here for a long time now.\nThat's why she has so many passionate fans.'%K%P
'So even with the same amount of Sakimitama\nthey wouldn't be such high quality, is that it?'%K%P
'It's not realistic for me to try to improve my\ndancing to be on par with Kagura, either.%K%P
That's something that could only be attained\nwith time and practice.'%K%P
Shuri's argument made sense.%K%P
Unlike how we used Love☆Kami to climb the ranks\nour opponent now was a veteran who has\nbeen adored by fans for nearly a full year.%K%P
Even if we did evolve a strategy to surpass Kagura,\nShuri's remaining rival would be a different story.%K%P
That's how things stood for now, anyway.%K%P
'If that's the case, let's fight back with\nthe level of your Sakimitama.'%K%P
'I'll handle the issue of quality.\nAs long as my love for you is stronger\nthan anyone else's, we'll be fine.'%K%P
If we were up against someone with hundreds of fans,\nmy love would just have to be hundreds of times\nmore intense.%K%P
On paper, there was nothing wrong with this plan.%K%P
'That plan sounds completely absurd...'%K%P
'But it's just the kind of thing only you\ncould think up.\nI'd like to see if you can really pull it off.'%K%P
Shuri actually accepted my ridiculous suggestion.%K%P
It was a risky strategy, but I had a good\nfeeling about it.%K%P
I mean, all I had to do was love my\ngorgeous new girlfriend. What could be simpler?%K%P
'Hey sis. It's Shuri.'%K%P
After saying goodbye to Yamato I called my sister.%K%P
As usual she wasn't answering, so I just\nleft a message.%K%P
'I've thought a lot about the audition,\nand I've decided I can't give up now.'%K%P
'If you really think this is too much for me,\nI'll just have to change.'%K%P
'I know I'm not as strong as you are.\nBut I have friends I can rely on.'%K%P
'If we face a problem we can't overcome alone,\nwe can reach out to others and triumph together.\nI truly believe that.'%K%P
'And I'm going to prove it to you.\nI'm not a child anymore. I'll show you that I'm more\nthan just someone that you have to protect.'%K%P
'And... There's one more thing I want to show you.\nHow wonderful it can be to turn to someone for help\nand support each other.%K%P
'But to do all that... I need some time away.'%K%P
'Pleased to meet you, my name is Shuri Kisshouten.\nI hope I won't be too much of a bother.'%K%P
The moment Shuri got to my house she started\nintroducing herself to my parents.%K%P
I never imagined it would come to this.%K%P
'I've decided to stay here with you for\nthe month or so left before the audition.'%K%P
'You might say I've run away and this is my hideout!'%K%P
'Whaaat?!'%K%P
'Can I put my bags down here?'%K%P
Without further explanation she started\nmaking herself at home.%K%P
'Hold on, Shuri, what do you think\nyou're doing?'%K%P
'Just what I said. I'm going to live here\nuntil the auditions are over.'%K%P
'Our plan is to increase the intensity of your\nfeelings toward me, right? That should be much\neasier if we're both under the same roof.'%K%P
Just like that, we were living together.%K%P
I won't pretend I wasn't happy about it,\nbut there was one thing that worried me.%K%P
'Did you say you've run away?'%K%P
'Oh, I suppose I did.'%K%P
'My sister's agency provides her with an apartment\nwith really tight security, so actually I've\nbeen living by myself.'%K%P
'But I thought calling this 'running away'\nmight rile her up a little.'%K%P
'You're so mean...'%K%P
'Or maybe I should have said I've\neloped with you, instead?'%K%P
'Wh...?! Hey, come on, that's going too far...'%K%P
'Hee hee, I'm only joking.\nLoosen up a little.'%K%P
Shuri seemed to enjoy teasing me.%K%P
I had a feeling my home life was about to\nget a lot more exciting.%K%P
